EmailTemplate.description: When Applicant Submitted the Onboarding form he will get Thank you Email
EmailTemplate.name: EMS_EM_Onboarding_Submitter
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for the response!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_First_Name__c}{!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_Last_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting the onboarding form. This email confirms our receipt of the same.
Our HR Executive will get in touch with you for any clarifications or action needed from your end.
Team HR CloudPeritus
